You've met Ross a couple of times before, and all you can tell is he is the horniest bastard around. He does the same to you, giving you a hard slap on the ass with a wink "How you doing little buddy?" he smiles and lets you through.

You are led through the house, looking in catching glimpses of Ross's spotless room, Jack's messy, filthy room and the spare room with its single bed and gym equipment sprawled everywhere. Past the kitchen with dishes in the sink and cases of beer covering the benchtops you enter into the loungeroom.

Jack is sitting comfortably in a pair of footy shorts with a longneck of beer in hand, the other hand nestled in his underwear. Jack was your brothers best friend, and he had stayed at your place a couple of times. He was absolutely disgusting, but absolutely hilarious. "Happy birthday old fart" he smiles up to Dean. he looks at you "Hey Sport, hows it hanging?" he says holding out his hand to shake. when you do you feel an intense warmth from it and realise it was the one just down his pants. He laughs as he realises the same thing. "Hey," he smiles as he holds up his left hand "Could be worse, could be this one whos spent some time 'round back if you know what I mean" both of you cant help but laugh as he sniffs it "pwoar thats gross"

Spence decides to nickname you 'Shagger', mostly because he spent all afternoon watching Austin Powers whilst getting high. Pat holds up his hand to give you high five "looks like you and me are the only ones under a quarter of a century here tonight eh?" you look at him questioningly "Well you're 21 and I dont turn 25 for another 4 months" you laugh and snap the hi five as spence slyly whispers to Pat "well not necessarily, there could be another little brother here" Pat snarls "well shutup about that for now..."

You're confused, but you dont get the chance to ask as Ross calls the guys in. The other two finish their joints before heading inside with you and Dean and grab seats on the two lounges.You grab a seat at the table. Ross stands infront of the TV with an old wooden box in hand. "As you know guys, at my 25th birthday 7 months ago, my dad gave me a special present, well 5. "Okay the rules for tonight - no permanent damage, dont tell anyone and of course, you have to be 25...sorry patty boy" Pat kicks an empty case an groans

Spence pipes up "Dont forget Shagger over there, if Lane wasnt allowed, he shouldnt be either" Ross looks at you "sorry mate, rules are rules. Remember don't tell anyone" you are taken aback in shock, confused more than ever so you just nod in silence. Ross opens the box and pulls out four of the 5 rings, leaving the last one in the box. and putting it down on the table. Jack, Spence, Ross and Dean all slip the rings on their fingers, all very excited. "Okay dean, give it a go" Ross says, sitting down next to you.

Dean points his fist at the tv, the glass bulb of the ring glows before the Tv shudders, contorts and grows from small shitty box to a massive black plasma screen. The boys all laugh "Shit yeah!" Ross exclaims! Ross turns to you "These rings are ...well they are basically magic. All we've learnt to do with them is some basic transforming and duplicating. We can make anything as big or as small as well like, with minute changes." you look at him questioningly "anything?" Ross just smirks "oh you've got a dirty mind like your bro and Jack. Jack tried to give himself a bigger dick but it didnt work, just made his pubes get thicker, no it has to be a whole body of matter, like a tv, a pizza, a beer or person." that last example triggers in your mind..they wouldnt really use it on each other would they? 11.content:
As the guys set up a table and chairs you slink back into an old recliner. If you’re lucky they will have their fun, you will get a unique night, and nothing bad will happen.

Before anything could happen though, there was a knock at the door—a pounding rather, followed by a loud belch. You felt the pit of your stomach drop out.

“Guys, Ror’ Ross says as he goes to answer the door. When he opens it you see Rory. Rory was the oldest of the group at 28. He was a big ginger rugby player and was somewhat of an amalgamation of everyone in the group. He was muscular, like your brother dean, but taller, at 6’2; he was as boisterous as Ross, and his wild orange hair and gigantic beard made him as wild as Spencer. Unfortunately though he was as open with his body and its grosser natures as Jack was. He was wearing his grass and mud stained rugby shirt and shorts—which seemed a size or two too small as his gut was hanging out and you could make out every curve of his bulbous ass.

http://40.media.tumblr.com/a701910619251...

“Hey fellas’ Big Ror’s here so the party can begin” He said, his voice deep and rocky. He held up a 30 pack of cheap beer. “And don’t worry guys,” he gave his gut a massive pat, a solid thud resounding about the room. “I loaded up on bar food before I came here so I won’t eat Dean’s kid brother” He laughed, as did the others. You just shuddered. Rory put his arms around Ross and gave him a big bear hug. “I might end up trashing your toilet though.”

Jack jumped up and pretended to punch Rory in the gut “Glad you could make it man. Come sit next to me at the table, that way no one will blame me for farting.” He said, and gave Rory’s ass a pat.

“Careful, I’m a loaded weapon, bub.” He said back

131.content:
Jack plods over, grinning eagerly as he squares off with you. With a grunt, he tugs his shirt up and over his head, tossing the sweat-stained garment on the floor. His body is thick, fat and hairy. Clearly there's some level of muscle...somewhere under there.

Before you know what's going on, you feel a tug against your neck. Ross pulls at your shirt, practically tearing it as he pulls it off you, despite your protests. "Hey!"

Ross laughs, slurring as he gives you a shove toward Jack. "C'mon Shagger, man up."

You turn your attention to Jack, who smirks, pounding a foot against the floor like a sumo wrestler. You grimace as he slaps his hands to the sides of his round gut, kneading and rolling it in a taunt as you circle each other.

You manage to dart away the first couple times Jack tries to grab you, wanting to play it smart. If you can get him off balance and trip him...

Before you know what's happened, Jack has a hold on your shoulder. You jerk back, trying to quickly break his grip, but Jack manages to yank you around, spinning you and putting your back to him. You thud back into a soft, hot, fleshy wall, Jack's ample stomach pressing into your back as his beefy arms wrap around your ribs, under your own arms.

You clamp your hands down on Jack's wrists, trying to break his hold as the other guys hoot, cheer and laugh. Jack grins, squeezing you tight. "I got 'im, boys!" Before you can react, Jack begins pumping his arms up and down, making you bounce on your knees slightly. Your face flushes and twists as you feel Jack's blubber belly shaking and jiggling against your back as he rubs you up and down his form.

You can't keep track of time as Jack toys with you, continuing to squish and shake you against him. Until you feel a pressure against your back. Forcing your knees to bend. You thrash harder as you realize Jack is driving both of you down, using his weight to force you to the ground. If he gets on top of you, you're screwed. You buck and push and jerk, only to find your knees on the floor. Then your hands. Then your chest. You grunt in a loud "OOF" as Jack thuds on top of you, pulling your arms out, his hands on your wrists to hold you in place.

The cheers get louder as Jack slowly and carefully pushes you, rolling you over. You almost manage to wriggle free. Almost. Before the beer-bloated behemoth flops down on you again. His gut weighing heavily on your chest.

Jack still has that playful grin, but now his demeanor has become more aggressive. Dominant. He holds your wrists down, dragging his way up. Your eyes get huge as you realize what he's trying to do.

"J...Jack! JACK! Fuck no! Stop it, man! DEAN, get him off me!"

Your clear panic just makes the other guys laugh harder as Jack slides up toward your head. "Time to get this belly on that face, little bud!"

You jerk your head to the side, grimacing as thick layers of blubber dusted with hair press down against your cheek, sandwiching your head against the floor. Your facial features smoosh as you feel the mound of meat shake, Jack gloating and chuckling at your dismay.

"C'mon buddy, time to smother."

You feel Jack's hand dig against your head, forcing you to turn. You shove at him with your newly freed hand, to no avail. You can barely take a sharp breath before Jack's fat belly swallows your face.

At this point it's over. You know it. Jack knows it. Everybody knows it. You're not sure what keeps you fighting, but you do. Struggling under the bigger man, legs pounding the floor. You can hear the muffled taunts and cackles, until finally you can't take any more. You frantically tap against Jack's back, over and over. For a few seconds you panic, tapping faster as he doesn't respond. Until he finally lifts up.

Light slams into your eyes as you gasp, inhaling deeply. Your face is red, your skin and hair covered in sweat. Panting, you heave on the floor, trying to catch your breath.

Jack plunks down on the floor next to you, tousling your hair and patting your chest.

"Nice fight, bud. But now..."
